name: BG: The Hard Platformer
description:
BG: The Hard Platformer -this is a platformer game in which you will suffer a little.

***

Here you have a long way to go, without SAVING. Moreover, the difficulty of the game will increase. The game is made in the style of minimalism - mainly 2 colors - black and red. Since this is early access, there will be a few bugs here. Jump over obstacles over and over again. Die more and more often. There are also soundtracks in the game. There are only 4 of them. But when the game comes out in full access, I will try to fix all acceptable and identified errors and improvements.

The game will appeal to hardcore fans.
